attributes.action: Increase Fines each year in line with inflation
attributes.additional_details:
Fines Must be increased each year in line with inflation, this would stop silly fines that are outdated and bring a little comfort to the Victims, many have not been raised for years.

This should be common sense to the Law makers and their Legal team.

It is really stupid for small fines to be handed out with Wages increased a great deal over this period, let's have more justice for All victims of Crimes fine wise.

Many prison terms handed out do not reflect the crime and give some comfort as well, this it why many go to appeal with most increased.
